ItemTooltips.sobi_mask: Get the recipe for Soul Ring as the rest of the items can be bought at the side shop.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Since you can farm fairly fast and Dark Seer doesn't need any items, you are ideal to pick up Mekansm, especially when you will be in the fight initiating.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Improves your ultimate ability and initiation with Aghanim's Scepter as foes are coupled into the Wall of Replica receiving an immense amount of damage.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Shiva's Guard offers you additional physical protection from attacks while also giving you a major slow that works well with your vacuum.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Soul Ring let's you spam your Ion Shell without being directly put in danger and amass the gold you need to snag Mekansm.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Drums of Endurance if you need more survivability and find yourself getting picked off a lot of times. Offers great buffs for your allies as well.

AbilityTooltips.dark_seer_vacuum: This is your greatest ability in team-fights. Be sure to use this after using your Wall of Replica to deal as many damage and replicas as possible.
AbilityTooltips.dark_seer_ion_shell: Ion Shell is how you control the lane, farm, and deal huge damage in team-fights as well. Be sure to cast this on physical carries either on the enemy team or your own (it always affects enemies, never your team).
AbilityTooltips.dark_seer_surge: You only want two levels in Surge for the escape. We are setting up Vacuum with your ultimate at level 10-11.
AbilityTooltips.dark_seer_wall_of_replica: This is your ultimate and it is pretty powerful too. Open this up in the middle of the team-fight and then follow-up with Vacuum. This one of the best current initiations in the game.
